post_text: May 15, 2019 at 1:14 PM#1Hey Hive Mind..I wonder, is there a way to create a macro to swap a specific fixture's Instances?For example, I have a fixture with 4 separate tilts, and I want to have the option to decide which TILT is the 1st, 2nd.. etc.So if I have fixture X.1/ X.2/ X.3/ X.4, where naturally, each Instance has a specific DMX channel in the dmx data sheet, so for example .1 is channels 11+12, .2 is 13+14, and so on, and I want to have .2 on channels 11+12 and .1 on 13+14..Anyone has a quick hack for this perhaps?Much appreciated..Denis
